title: World Championship Team
description: Our team won two awards at the FIRST World Championship in 2019, along with numerous other accolades at the regional and state levels.

title: Sustainability
description: All members of our team are trained in Design & CAD, Programming, Manufacturing, and are dedicated STEM activists.

title: Cutting Edge Technology
description: Our team always uses cutting edge technology including CAD stress analysis and simulations, tensorflow, AWS, and more. Feel free to check out our GitHub Repository with robot code at https://github.com/cwu159/FTC_14607
